question.sentence: The old woman who Nigel helped wrote to thank him.
A friend my daughter met at university is now a famous actor.
Those people who parked their car in our place have finally left.
The policeman who called last night is going to phone again.
All the doctors Matthew went to see gave him different advice.
Some of the teachers my mother talked to were new.

It was an old school friend who Meg hadn't seen for years.
